title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE31008 3 - 0 - 0: 3 CreditsRamjets and scramjets, ram rockets, space planes, Classification and performance analysis of nuclear fission and fusion rockets. Plasma rockets, Electrostatic thrusters, MHD propulsion, laser rockets, solar thermal rockets, solar sail, other advanced propulsion concepts.
